featured.text: But this story written 40 years ago __(27)__ predicted the arrival of a recent method of genetic engineering—cloning.
What does “an engineering feat” mean? (A) A big success in construction.
Rapid advancement in motor engineering makes it _____ possible to build a flying car in the near future.

other.text: Which of the following fields is NOT mentioned for Velcro uses in the passage? (A) Civil engineering.
how the ancient Egyptians created such marvelous feats of engineering as the pyramids? (A) concluded (B) wondered (C) admitted (D) persuaded 5.
The road is considered an engineering feat.

definition.zh_def: 工程學；應用科學的技術和設計。
definition.en_def: The application of scientific and mathematical principles to design and build structures, machines, and systems.
definition.example: She decided to pursue a degree in engineering to design sustainable buildings.
